S

scale(double) - Method in class poist.shapes.Circle
Scales the rectangle by a factor of x
scale(double) - Method in class poist.shapes.Rectangle
Scales the width and height of the rectangle by a factor of x.
setFillColor(Color) - Method in class poist.shapes.Shapes
Sets the fill color of the shape to other.
setPoint2(double, double) - Method in class poist.shapes.Line

Shapes - Class in poist.shapes
This is an abstract class that represents types of shapes.
Shapes(double, double) - Constructor for class poist.shapes.Shapes
Represents a shapes with location of (x,y).
Shapes(double, double, Color, Color, int) - Constructor for class poist.shapes.Shapes
Represents a shape with location of (x,y), stroke color of sColor, fill color of fColor, and strokeWeight of sWeight.
